title: Input Validator
description: Create a validation system that collects multiple validation errors instead of failing on the first one.
instructions: Write a validate function for a registration form (name, email, age) that returns a list of error messages. Test with invalid input and print all errors.

hints.text: Create a mutableListOf<String>() to collect errors
Check each field and add error messages to the list
Return the list -- empty list means valid input

commonMistakes.consequence: User only sees one error at a time
commonMistakes.correction: Collect all errors and return them as a list
Check name, email format, and age range
Return error lists for expected validation failures
